text: Bishop Rayappu Joseph (; 16 April 1940 â€“ 1 April 2021) was a Sri Lanka Tamil prelate. He was the Roman Catholic Bishop of Mannar. Joseph was ordained as a priest in December 1967. He was a professor at the St Xavier's Seminary, Jaffna. In July 1992 he was appointed Bishop of Mannar and was ordained as a bishop in October 1992. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Sri Lankan people Category:Roman Catholic bishops
title: Rayappu Joseph
